ProfessionalSummary: A data driven entrepreneurial media commercial leader with 21 years' experience and a track record of building successful client revenue streams in Ad Tech, Programmatic & Agency environment. Strong relationships with global publishers, agencies, brands & AdTech vendors at C-Level down. A proven management track record of International, operational & board level engagement with a focus on clear communication & client leadership, Integrity and P&L delivery.

ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in the management of:  Marketing (Marketing Communications; Advertising); and Finance.    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~   has 12 years of work experience, with 12 years of management experience, including a high-level position.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementStory:
Current position is a executive-level management role: Founder
Starting on 1/1/2017, the candidate held the following executive-level management position for 4 years and 3 months:
	Title: Founder for Boxing Social
Current position is a executive-level management role: Managing Partner
Starting on 3/1/2020, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 12 months:
	Title: Managing Partner for Digital Marketing Solutions
Starting on 9/1/2018, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 18 months:
	Title: Founder (Personal Project) for TravelHack
Starting on 1/1/2013, the candidate held the following executive-level management position for 5 years and 2 months:
	Title: Chief Commercial Officer / CO-Founder for Chalk
Starting on 10/1/2012, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 4 months:
	Title: UK Director of Trading for Sizmek By Amazon
Starting on 10/1/2011, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 12 months:
	Title: Head of Trading EMEA for OpenX
Starting on 1/1/2011, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 9 months:
	Title: Head of Digital & Strategy for DataXu
Starting on 11/1/2008, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 2 years and 2 months:
	Title: Sales Director for Lycos

Positions.Description: Established April 2017, Boxing Social has risen to become the UK's most visited boxing news and entertainment destination. Reaching millions unique visitors every month across Facebook (750K) Instagram (50K), Twitter (24K) & YouTube (108K), Boxing Social is the largest online boxing community in the UK.

DMS is a full-service advertising agency focused on the tourism industry, uniquely structured to service a variety of clients across the globe. We have clients from the US to the Caribbean and through Mexico and everywhere in between. Our goal is to free up bandwidth for our clients and allow them to focus on the bigger picture or, at the very least, the parts of their jobs they enjoy most. We are the largest tour provider in the world bar none.

• Client lead on strategy & channel planning, TV, Radio, Digital
• Strategic and big-picture thinker for the team
• Day to day management of Investment, activation & operation teams
• Management of channel heads
• Expert in briefing a team of specialists and the ability to bridge planning and specialist execution.
• Re opening strategy lead
• Always converting new revenue opportunities
• Providing accurate forecasting of client spend per channel.
• C-level suite gate keeper & communicator
• Finance & legal lead on allocated accounts.

The TravelHack platform is a progressive Travel subscription model that appeals to every consumer with common sense. Instead of charging our user the Industry Standard mark-ups, TravelHack provides immediate and transparent wholesale savings, totalling potentially of thousands of dollars with a single booking. Prices are clearly displayed beside comparable pricing from Major so called 'Discount Travel Platforms' providing transparent real-time savings.

Chalk is an independent award-winning digital agency that plans, buys and sells all forms of digital media transparently and agnostically. With our head office based in London's 'silicon roundabout', we offer display, social, native, video, digital out of home, digital radio, and addressable TV planning, buying and optimization. Alongside our in-house creative
team, we are a 3.0 digital advertising powerhouse. A mix of strategists, analysts and technology experts from direct response, brand and programmatic backgrounds, we have been disrupting the digital landscape since our launch at the turn of 2013. We are the agency of choice for forward thinking brands across entertainment, fashion, luxury, FMCG, technology and automotive. Whether we are running a seven-figure global campaign, or shoestring budget for a start-up, our approach remains the same. We thrive on solving business problems.

Awards include: Top 10 Elite Agency in The Drum Independent Agencies Census 2016, Top 30 Agency in the Recommended Agency Register 2016, 2 awards & 4 nominations in the Online Retail Awards 2016, 4 nominations at The Social Buzz Awards 2016, Top 10 Agency in The Drum Independent Agencies Census 2015, Best Creative Business at the London Loves Excellence Awards 2015, Best Fashion eCommerce for Warehouse at the eCommerce Awards 2014, and Best Digital Marketing Campaign for The Children's Society at the Digital Media Awards 2014.

• Day to day management of all heads of departments

Hobbies / Interests and Projects
Travelling, experiencing new cultures and dining, fishing, wine tasting, keeping fit, Farther to for 4 boys, Nottingham Forest supporter who has a massive passion for boxing & a hate for Derby.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
PROFILE

A data driven entrepreneurial media commercial leader with 21 years' experience and a track record of building successful client revenue streams in Ad Tech, Programmatic & Agency environment. Strong relationships with global publishers, agencies, brands & AdTech vendors at C-Level down. A proven management track record of International, operational & board level engagement with a focus on clear communication & client leadership, Integrity and P&L delivery.

SKILLS


• Digital Investment
• Digital activation
• Digital trading
• Digital acquisition
• Performance marketing
• PPC scale expert
• Extensive global cross-channel media & Coms planning,
• Programmatic activation
• Paid social strategy.
• Social ROI & engagement
• Brand planning and execution
• Brand advertising & measurement
• Digital Innovation
• Client services lead
• Client reporting excellence
• P&L delivery
• New business
• Technology champion
• Attribution modelling
• 3rd party ad-technology partnerships
• Analytical Skills
• All things biddable, RTB & programmatic
• Team training and development
• The ability to attract and recruit top talent.
• Digital thought leader
• Award winning content creation
• Agency brand ambassador
• Ad serving architecture.
• Proficiency in ad tech and marketing automation systems,


Achievements

• Pioneer of Facebook advertising (managing one of the first million-pound accounts on the platform)
• Successfully launched the first independent agency trading desks in the UK.
• Project managed one of the first Ad-Network API integrations into AppNexus (Buy & Sell side)
• Sole responsibility of Orange Ads Market growing the revenue from 500K to 3 million per month.
• Created an award winning, multi-million-pound billing agency from scratch with no investment.
• Grew the digital team from 2 -120 out of Google campus ending up in prestigious offices in Shoreditch.
• Worked on a range of clients growing their digital spend significantly and investment in digital as a channel.
• Launched Boxing Social (Hobby) now the largest boxing social community in the UK with over 750K on FB, 108K subscribers on UT and 75K on Insta (all organic) delivering millions of views a month across social media.
• Extensive network of celebrity and sporting contacts
